intro.title:
Switzerland
Tour-weyn
intro.welcome: Soo dhawaada, waxaan ahay Maya. Waxaan kuu soo bandhignayaa ka degi Switzerland!
intro.credits: Kalsoonida sameeyay Antistatique kaasoo sameeyay Yann iyo Pierre, waxayna kaga hadlaan maqaalkan.

chat.ask_maya: Baro Maya wax badan oo ku saabsan goobtani...

progress.enjoy_the_view: Ka faa'iido taariikhda, waxaan soo dhammaannaysoon hore.
